101.comments: IF course is FULL please contact School of Nursing Student Support Office (academic.support@nursing.ubc.ca)This section is prioritized for MSN and MPHMSN students.This course provides students with the opportunity to explore the evolution of nursing knowledge and the processes of theoretical and analytical reasoning as they apply to nursing. In the context of the course students will apply critical thinking to the understanding and resolution of nursing problems.

102.comments: IF course is FULL please contact School of Nursing Student Support Office (academic.support@nursing.ubc.ca)This course is prioritized for 1st Year MN-NP students.This course provides students with the opportunity to explore the evolution of nursing knowledge and the processes of theoretical and analytical reasoning as they apply to nursing. In the context of the course students will apply critical thinking to the understanding and resolution of nursing problems.

002.comments: IF course is FULL please contact School of Nursing Student Support Office (academic.support@nursing.ubc.ca)This course is prioritized for MSN and MPHMSN students.Theoretical Foundations of Nursing Practice - This course provides students with the opportunity to explore the evolution of nursing knowledge and the processes of theoretical and analytical reasoning as they apply to nursing. In the context of the course students will apply critical thinking to the understanding and resolution of nursing problems.  * every second week starting with start week
